title: Manager
text: Manage the After-school program consisting of 10 teachers and 60 students. Taught a Saturday Math program for elementary and junior high school students

title: Owner / Business Administrator
text: Led and managed the After-school and Saturday program for statewide standardized test preparation. Designed curriculum for the New York Statewide Exam (grades 3 - 5). Reduced costs of the summer program by 35% by investing in the hiring of subject-versatile teaching staffs.

title: Administrative Director
text: Led and managed an after-school program with more than 60 students. Trained over 60 after-school, summer camp teachers and teacher's assistants. Responsible for an annual budget of $120,000 distributed for hiring needs, operational costs and employee travel expenses. Reduced hiring costs by 40% with strategic lesson planning and curriculum design

title: Software Engineer
text: Redesigned the company's website with tailwindcss to improve the user experience. Client has a non-technical background, I designed it in a way that the restaurant menu can be updated through a single CSV file.

title: Full-Stack Software Engineer
text: Developed and implemented PDF/IMAGE chat feature utilizing the Google Gemini Vision Pro, it allows user to ask questions about the pdf or image they uploaded. Also moved our storage database that onto Google Cloud Platform to improve the reliability and scalability of the application.
